name: Travel Buddy
author: travelbuddy

sections.description:
This plugin adds a powerful widget to your WordPress site, allowing users to check visa requirements for 199 different passports and 209 destinations. It delivers real-time updates on visa policies, ensuring your audience has access to the latest travel information.

Features

  • Install once and maintain effortlessly – Easily integrates with any WordPress site.
  • Enhanced User Experience: Provides your visitors with an easy-to-use tool to quickly check visa requirements, enhancing the overall user experience on your website.
  • Stay Updated: Offers real-time updates on visa policies, ensuring that your users always have access to the most current information.
  • Increased Engagement: Keeps users on your site longer as they interact with the widget to explore visa requirements for different destinations.
  • Attracts Traffic: By providing valuable information that can be hard to find, your site can attract more visitors from search engines and social media.

Developed by the website experts at travelbuddy.

External Services

This plugin relies on the Travel Buddy API to provide real-time visa requirements and travel information. When users check visa requirements using the widget, their request is sent to the Travel Buddy API, which processes the request and returns the necessary information.

  • Service Name: Travel Buddy API
  • Service URL: https://rapidapi.com/TravelBuddyAI/api/visa-requirement
  • API key: API key can be requested here
  • Privacy Policy: Travel Buddy API Privacy Policy
  • Terms of Use: Travel Buddy API Terms of Use

By using this plugin, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined by the Travel Buddy API.

Requirements

  • WordPress 6.0
  • PHP 5.6

Privacy Assurance

We do not collect any technical data from our users. The plugin relies on the Travel Buddy API to provide real-time visa requirements and travel information. Please review the Travel Buddy API Privacy Policy for more details.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

  1. Go to Plugins -> Add New in the WordPress admin panel.
  2. Type “Travel Buddy” in the search bar.
  3. Click the ‘Install’ button found under the Travel Buddy plugin.
  4. After installation, activate the plugin by clicking on ‘Activate’.

Manual Installation

  1. Login to the WordPress admin panel and select Plugins -> Add New.
  2. Choose the ‘Upload’ option.
  3. Click ‘Choose File’ and select the travel-buddy.zip file you have downloaded.
  4. Click ‘Install Now’.
  5. To activate, find the Travel Buddy under Plugins -> Installed Plugins and click ‘Activate’.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.1.0

  • Change the API provider.
  • Fix missing country list

Version 1.0.2

  • Fix the “We are currently experiencing a temporary technical issue. Please try again later” message that appears due to a conflict with some cache plugins.

Version 1.0.1

  • Added documentation for the use of the Travel Buddy API.
  • Improved security.

Version 1.0.0

  • First stable release.

Version 0.9.0

  • Initial release.
